resume.summary: I have a Bachelor's degree in Information Systems and work as a developer focused on Node.js with TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Go. I build web applications, microservices, and APIs as a full-stack developer, always focused on scalability, quality, and best practices. I also have interests in information security and DevOps.
resume.experience.sps.title: Senior Software Developer, SPS Group
resume.experience.sps.items: Senior Software Developer working across backend and frontend.
Full-stack solutions with React.js and Node.js.
System architecture, scalability, and best practices.
resume.experience.gringo.title: Software Engineer, Gringo
resume.experience.gringo.items: Mobile app development with React Native.
Microservices development in Node.js with TypeScript.
PostgreSQL database integration and Firebase services.
Monitoring tooling with New Relic and Prometheus.
Deploying applications to Kubernetes on Google Cloud.
resume.experience.callix.title: Full-stack Developer, Callix
resume.experience.callix.items: Full-stack development with Node.js, React.js, and Next.js.
resume.experience.climatempo.title: Full-stack Developer, Climatempo
